name: Mirko [My Hero Academia] Character LoRA
description:
Mirko from My Hero Academia - Character LoRA

If you like what I create, feel free to support on Ko-Fi!🍵

Make sure to leave a review if you like it, would love to see all the pictures everyone creates!

One of my favorite characters from My Hero Academia, Mirko (Rumi Usagiyama)! Trained on the NovelAI model, and tested with many different anime specific models such as AOM3, AOM2_Hard, NovelAI, Anything v4.5, Midnight Mixers, Based64Mixv-V3, and a few others. This LoRA definitely can produce images of Mirko in her Hero outfit very well. However, you can also feel free to generate her in other outfits, such as a tank top and shorts in one of my example images. I found that this LoRA works well with a weight of 0.9 - 1. I have generally found a weight of 1 works perfectly fine in all circumstances. Have found a CFG between 7-9 works well, along with Step around 25-30, but feel free to experiment! Also Clip Skip of 2.

  • Triggers are: mirkomha and boku no hero academia

  • Description Tags that may help: white leotard, purple thighhighs, rabbit ears, red eyes, sleeveless, white gloves, highleg leotard, white hair, very long hair, large breasts, fur collar, dark skin, dark-skinned female
